description: This table holds the quantity of each coded CPT contributing to coding-only and combined service lines. The quantity in this table is associated with the Coding Info line number in CODE_INT_COD_INF_LN. Values are only available for coding-only and combined lines. Rows will not be extracted for charge-only lines.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: CODE_INT_CODE_INFO_QUAN
columns.description: This holds the total quantity contributing to the service line from a single Coding Current Procedural Terminology code. The item will only have a value for coding-only and combined lines. It will be blank for transaction-only lines.
